Articles.Content:
![oUfn5MJ.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/oUfn5MJ.png?1)

Hello I am DrNickDoom and welcome to Housedoom Rocketry KSP 1.0 with mods

Taking off where beta say goodbye I left off, and with all the skills I learnt or i guess relearnt with the help of the twitch chat and the YouTube comments

Mods:

Kerbal Construction Time [bit.do/KerbalConstructionTime](http://bit.do/KerbalConstructionTime)

Kerbal Engineer [bit.do/KerbalEngineer](http://bit.do/KerbalEngineer)

kOS [bit.do/kOS](http://bit.do/kOS)

and

Thunder Aerospace Corporation's Life Support system [bit.do/TACLifeSupport](http://bit.do/TACLifeSupport)

( feel free to suggest more mods )

Now not all of the mods have 1.0 version but i the only problems i know of can be worked around easily so lets get a head start ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Regards

DrNickDoom of HouseDoom

youtube.com/HouseDoom1

twitch.tv/drnickdoom

twitter.com/DrNickDoom

Link to the playlist 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PL3DtmkqHDMd0lomy3x3qQbAvuFFy6mqgb" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T11:49:15Z" title="05/06/2015 11:49  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by DrNickDoom**
  
adding new mod

as of the next stream (today btw 17:00GMT+0 ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) ) all mods in OP will be in and working with 1.0 also adding TAC Life Support which may mean the death of Jeb as he is stuck in orbit atm ooppsss

Regards

DrNickDoom of HouseDoom

youtube.com/HouseDoom1

twitch.tv/drnickdoom

twitter.com/DrNickDoom
